svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Proportion of population with basic handwashing facilities, urban vs rural,
Share of population in urban areas versus rural areas with access to basic handwashing facilities. Basic handwashing facilities
are defined as a device to contain, transport or regulate the flow of water to facilitate handwashing with soap and water in the
Share of population in rural areas
Share of population in urban areas
Source: WHO/UNICEF Joint Monitoring Programme for Water Supply, Sanitation and Hygiene (JMP)
